title: Modeling Narrative Dynamics for Volatility Regime Detection in Financial Markets
author: Gabin Taibi

chapters.title: Systematic Literature Review of Narratives in Finance
chapters.description: AI-enhanced systematic review mapping narrative concepts in financial research

chapters.title: Key Financial Market Narratives
chapters.description: Narrative detection methods: supervised embeddings, LLM tagging, and unsupervised clustering

chapters.title: Market Microstructure and Volatility Modeling
chapters.description: HFT analysis using nanosecond data; realized, implied, and rough volatility estimation

chapters.title: Do Narratives Drive Markets?
chapters.description: Extending Sadka et al. framework to evaluate narrative explanatory power

chapters.title: Narrative-Driven Volatility Structural Breaks
chapters.description: Integrating textual and volatility features for regime detection

chapters.title: Conclusion: Synthesizing Narratives and Volatility
chapters.description: Integration of findings and implications for risk management
